attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are being forced to give up the standard light bulb to save carbon emmisions. OK what about the thousands of televisions blazing away in all the electrical shops in Britain. How much carbon there? Tell them to have only 3 at most to advertise  otherwise turn them off in store.
The same goes for the advertisings monitors in supermarkets WHO takes any notice of them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
